nvcc -m64 -I/usr/local/cuda/include -I../Common -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -o bandwidthTest.o -c bandwidthTest.cu
g++ -O3 bandwidthTest.o -o bandwidthTest -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64 -lcudart -lm
./bandwidthTest --device=0 --memory=pageable --mode=range --start=1024 --end=67108864 --increment=524288 --htod
